languages.text: "Наивные дети! Неужели вам не твердили с детства, какую опасность несут творения {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}? И не предупреждали, что ими может оказаться любое неизвестное изделие?"

traits.locale_text: "Наивные дети! Неужели вам не твердили с детства, какую опасность несут творения {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}? И не предупреждали, что ими может оказаться любое неизвестное изделие?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"
languages.original_text: "Наивные дети! Неужели вам не твердили с детства, какую опасность несут творения {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}? И не предупреждали, что ими может оказаться любое неизвестное изделие?"

traits.locale_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the Archenemy's creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the Archenemy's creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the Archenemy's creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy's{/g} creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “你们这些幼稚的孩子啊！你们不是从小就知道，{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的造物有多么危险吗？任何你们不熟悉的东西都可能是他们的造物，难道就没人警告过你们吗？”
languages.original_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"

traits.locale_text: “你们这些幼稚的孩子啊！你们不是从小就知道，{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的造物有多么危险吗？任何你们不熟悉的东西都可能是他们的造物，难道就没人警告过你们吗？”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Críos ingenuos! ¿No os enseñaron de pequeños lo peligrosas que eran las creaciones del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}? ¿No se os advirtió de que cualquier objeto desconocido podría ser una de ellas?».
languages.original_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Críos ingenuos! ¿No os enseñaron de pequeños lo peligrosas que eran las creaciones del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}? ¿No se os advirtió de que cualquier objeto desconocido podría ser una de ellas?».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「愚かな子供たちよ！{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の創造物の危険性について、幼い頃から教わってこなかったのか？見慣れぬ物体はすべて渾沌の勢力のものである可能性があると警告されなかったのか？」
languages.original_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"

traits.locale_text: 「愚かな子供たちよ！{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}の創造物の危険性について、幼い頃から教わってこなかったのか？見慣れぬ物体はすべて渾沌の勢力のものである可能性があると警告されなかったのか？」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Naive Kinder! Hat man Euch denn nicht von frühester Kindheit an beigebracht, welche Gefahr von den Schöpfungen des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} ausgeht? Wurdet Ihr denn nicht gewarnt, dass jeder unbekannte Gegenstand von ihnen stammen könnte?"
languages.original_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"

traits.locale_text: "Naive Kinder! Hat man Euch denn nicht von frühester Kindheit an beigebracht, welche Gefahr von den Schöpfungen des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} ausgeht? Wurdet Ihr denn nicht gewarnt, dass jeder unbekannte Gegenstand von ihnen stammen könnte?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Comment pouvez-vous être aussi naïfs ? Ne vous a-t-on pas mis en garde dès votre plus jeune âge contre les dangers liés aux créations du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} ? On a pourtant dû vous avertir qu'ils pouvaient se cacher jusque dans les objets les plus insignifiants ! »
languages.original_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"

traits.locale_text: « Comment pouvez-vous être aussi naïfs ? Ne vous a-t-on pas mis en garde dès votre plus jeune âge contre les dangers liés aux créations du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g} ? On a pourtant dû vous avertir qu'ils pouvaient se cacher jusque dans les objets les plus insignifiants ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Safderun kardeşlerim! Henüz çocukluğunuzda {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} yarattıklarından sakınmayı öğrenmediniz mi? Bilmediğiniz nesnelerin bunlardan biri olabileceği konusunda ikaz edilmediniz mi?"
languages.original_text: "Naive children! Weren't you taught from an early age about the dangers of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}'s creations? Weren't you warned that any unfamiliar object could be one of them?"

traits.locale_text: "Safderun kardeşlerim! Henüz çocukluğunuzda {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın yarattıklarından sakınmayı öğrenmediniz mi? Bilmediğiniz nesnelerin bunlardan biri olabileceği konusunda ikaz edilmediniz mi?"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
